5#ifndef V8_CODEGEN_CODE_REFERENCE_H_
6#define V8_CODEGEN_CODE_REFERENCE_H_
7
8#include "src/base/platform/platform.h"
9#include "src/handles/handles.h"
10#include "src/objects/code.h"
11
12namespace v8 {
13namespace internal {
14
15class InstructionStream;
16class Code;
17class CodeDesc;
18
19namespace wasm {
20class WasmCode;
21} // namespace wasm
22
23class CodeReference {
24 public:
25 CodeReference() : kind_(Kind::NONE), null_(nullptr) {}
26 explicit CodeReference(const wasm::WasmCode* wasm_code)
27 : kind_(Kind::WASM_CODE), wasm_code_(wasm_code) {}
28 explicit CodeReference(const CodeDesc* code_desc)
29 : kind_(Kind::CODE_DESC), code_desc_(code_desc) {}
30 explicit CodeReference(Handle<Code> code) : kind_(Kind::CODE), code_(code) {}
31
32 Address constant_pool() const;
33 Address instruction_start() const;
34 Address instruction_end() const;
35 int instruction_size() const;
36 const uint8_t* relocation_start() const;
37 const uint8_t* relocation_end() const;
38 int relocation_size() const;
39 Address code_comments() const;
40 int code_comments_size() const;
41
42 bool is_null() const { return kind_ == Kind::NONE; }
43 bool is_code() const { return kind_ == Kind::CODE; }
44 bool is_wasm_code() const { return kind_ == Kind::WASM_CODE; }
45
46 Handle<Code> as_code() const {
47 DCHECK_EQ(Kind::CODE, kind_);
48 return code_;
49 }
50
51 const wasm::WasmCode* as_wasm_code() const {
52 DCHECK_EQ(Kind::WASM_CODE, kind_);
53 return wasm_code_;
54 }
55
56 private:
57 enum class Kind { NONE, CODE, WASM_CODE, CODE_DESC } kind_;
58 union {
59 std::nullptr_t null_;
60 const wasm::WasmCode* wasm_code_;
61 const CodeDesc* code_desc_;
62 Handle<Code> code_;
63 };
64
65 DISALLOW_NEW_AND_DELETE()
66};
67ASSERT_TRIVIALLY_COPYABLE(CodeReference);
68
69} // namespace internal
70} // namespace v8
71
72#endif // V8_CODEGEN_CODE_REFERENCE_H_
